# The `MCDwarfLoc` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent the information from a dwarf .loc directive. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCDwarfLoc</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent the information from a dwarf .loc directive.

Definition at line 105 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h">MCDwarf.h</a>.
